hooks.command:
# Send desktop notification when agent completes
if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then
    # macOS notification
    osascript -e 'display notification "Agent task completed successfully" with title "Claude Code" sound name "Glass"'
elif command -v notify-send &> /dev/null; then
    # Linux notification
    notify-send "Claude Code" "Agent task completed successfully"
else
    echo "Desktop notifications not supported on this platform"
fi
